definition: to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: We changed the cooling machine of water for injection to double-end plate layer pipe heat changing machine.
sentences.chinese: 注射用水的冷却器采用双管端板壳管式换热器。

sentences.english: A simple model for heat transfer analysis of flat-plate heat exchanger with Phase Change Material ( PCM )is built.
sentences.chinese: 建立了板式相变贮能换热器的无量纲传热模型。

sentences.english: The hot water heat exchanger respectively connects to tap water pipe and heat insulating water tank.
sentences.chinese: 该热水换热器分别与自来水管和保温水箱连接。

sentences.english: The types and operating principle of heat exchangers are explained.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了换热器的类型及工作原理。

sentences.english: The cause and atraumatic method of the break in pipe of graphite heat exchanger are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 分析石墨换热器列管破裂的原因及其防止的办法。

sentences.english: For the shell-tube heat exchanger a novel tube arrangement of diameter reducing is presented in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 针对管壳式换热器，提出一种新的异径管布管方式。

sentences.english: From the crude heater, the hot crude oil is delivered to the crude tower above the fourth tray.
sentences.chinese: 经过原油换热器，热的原油被送至初馏塔第四层塔盘。

sentences.english: The structure and principle of new type high altitude extracting core working vehicle for heat exchanger was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了新型换热器高空抽芯作业车的结构原理。

sentences.english: This paper study the model on line monitoring fouling in tubular heat exchangers.
sentences.chinese: 进行了管式换热器积灰的在线监测模型研究。

sentences.english: Chengfeng brand heat exchangers and fasteners won the title as famous AAproducts.
sentences.chinese: 乘风牌换热器，美力达风机为AA省名牌产品。

sentences.english: And principle of installation of expansion joint in fixed tubesheet exchanger is also given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 阐明了固定管板式换热器中膨胀节的设置原则。

sentences.english: A calculation followed all operating conditions is made to air-precooled heat exchangers, parameters of which are selected.
sentences.chinese: 对选定参数的空气预冷换热器作了全工况跟踪计算。

sentences.english: One of the most common types of extended surface heat exchangers.
sentences.chinese: 一种最通用的扩大表面积的换热器。

sentences.english: The basic features of the curved surface helical baffle heat exchanger with special form of baffles was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种具有特殊折流形式的螺旋折流板换热器。

sentences.english: The experimental results show that the fluid flow in tube bundles is angled to the tubes.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，螺旋折流板换热器管间流体斜向冲刷管束。

sentences.english: Heat exchanger made from special alloy, Scale prevention, Anti-corrosion, Ultra thickness.
sentences.chinese: 特种合金换热器，防垢，耐腐超厚。

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
